text:
Had a gathering there over the weekend!
We didn't order much food, mostly drinks. But service was wonderful.
We had a good experience!

Food is nice; I highly recommend the fish and chips! They are meaty and fresh.

The staff are very friendly. We made some jokes and chatted with them, and the smiles never left their faces!

We used Eatigo and got 50% off during non-peak hours. It's really worth it for the atmosphere, good service, and food! We will come back and recommend it to other friends!

Stopped by for a burger of a Friday evening. It was not very busy and the service was quick enough. Burger was tasty when if there was not much atmosphere there.
